name: mininode
description: Mininode is a tool to reduce JavaScript code by using "sophisticated" techniques

scripts.test: npm run test:dry && npm run test:coarse && npm run test:fine
scripts.test:coarse: node index.js test-module/ -m=coarse -d=mininode.coarse --verbose && cp test-module/check.js mininode.coarse/ && node mininode.coarse/ && node mininode.coarse/check.js
scripts.test:fine: node index.js test-module/ -m=fine -d=mininode.fine --verbose && cp test-module/check.js mininode.fine/ && node mininode.fine/ && node mininode.fine/check.js

author: Igibek Koishybayev
